thread.title: Business Wire’s BizWireTV Launches New Episode
thread.title_full: Business Wire’s BizWireTV Launches New Episode

author: admin
title: Business Wire’s BizWireTV Launches New Episode
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 3:00 AM   Business Wire 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Business Wire announces the newest episode of BizWireTV today, a weekly series covering trending news stories published over the newswire’s distribution network. The show spotlights stories on disruptive startups and technologies, entrepreneurs and funding announcements, hot business trends and companies to watch. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151023005244/en/ 
This week’s episode features: Tommy Hilfiger becomes the first retailer to bring 3D to its stores. Tweet this! Google and The New York Times collaborate to launch NYT VR. Tweet this! Apple’s ResearchKit is a software toolkit used to create apps for clinical studies. Tweet this! Time Inc. acquires Zooey Deschanel’s mobile and social lifestyle brand HelloGiggles. Tweet this! Founders of VEEV Spirits named one of Goldman Sachs’ 100 Most Intriguing Entrepreneurs of 2015. Tweet this! Microsoft, HP, Lenovo, Dell and Intel collaborate on first joint ad campaign showcasing PC innovation. Tweet this! Scoot Networks and Nissan team up to launch Scoot Quad Tweet this! 
A core component of the video programming is news-related data analysis powered by Business Wire’s NewsTrak reports and NUVI social media tracking. BizWireTV is hosted by Erin Ade , watch for new episodes each Friday available on www.BusinessWire.com 
The weekly schedule for BizWireTV episodes: 
BizWireTV: Friday at 6:00am 
BizWireTV Accelerator Report: Sunday at 3:00pm 
Click here to share BizWireTV’s latest episode on Twitter: http://ctt.ec/1A58f 
About Business Wire 
Business Wire, a Berkshire Hathaway company, is the global leader in press release distribution and regulatory disclosure . Investor relations, public relations, public policy and marketing professionals rely on Business Wire to accurately distribute market-moving news and multimedia , host online newsrooms and IR websites , build content marketing platforms , generate social engagements and provide audience analysis that improves interaction with specified target markets. Founded in 1961, Business Wire is a trusted source for news organizations, journalists, investment professionals and regulatory authorities, delivering news directly into editorial systems and leading online news sources via its multi-patented simultaneous NX Network. Business Wire has 32 offices worldwide to securely meet the varying needs of communications professionals and news consumers. 
Learn more at BusinessWire.com and the BusinessWired blog ; follow updates on Twitter: @businesswire or on Facebook . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151023005244/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
